DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine whether raise blood glucose enhances lipid particle production independent effect gastric empty pancreatic/ gastrointestinal hormone production .
DOC.brief_title: Regulation Intestinal Hepatic Lipoprotein Particle Production Blood Glucose Humans
DOC.detailed_description: This study perform healthy , lean , non-diabetic male female participate two study random order , 4 6 week apart . Study A : lipoprotein turnover intravenous infusion normal saline . Study B : lipoprotein turnover i.v infusion glucose . In study , subject drink liquid formula every hour remain constant fed state condition pancreatic clamp ( infusion hormone somatostatin , insulin , glucagon , growth hormone ) . Subjects blind regard treatment .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Men woman , age 18 60 year 2 . Body mass index 20 kg/m2 27 kg/m2 3 . Hemoglobin 130g/L 4 . Normal glucose tolerance response 75g , 2hr OGTT 1 . Subject history hepatitis/hepatic disease active within previous two year . 2 . Any subject active bleeding , bleed diathesis , clot abnormality recent surgery ( within past 1 month ) 3 . Any significant active ( past 12 month ) disease gastrointestinal , pulmonary , neurological , renal ( Cr > 1.5 mg/dL ) , genitourinary , hematological system , severe uncontrolled treated untreated hypertension ( sit diastolic BP > 100 systolic > 180 ) . 4 . History diabetes OGTT indicative diabetes impair glucose tolerance . 5 . Any history MI clinically significant , active , cardiovascular history include history arrhythmia 's conduction delay ECG , unstable angina , decompensated heart failure . 6 . Any laboratory value : AST > 2x ULN ; ALT > 2x ULN TSH > 6 mU/l 7 . Current addiction alcohol substance abuse determine investigator . 8 . Mental incapacity , unwillingness language barrier preclude adequate understanding cooperation 9 . Taking prescription nonprescription medication time study 10 . Having donate blood three month prior three month post study procedures 11 . A pregnancy test perform 1 3 day prior study female subject . Those test positive pregnancy exclude . 12 . Known allergy , hypersensitivity contraindication receive study medication .
